participant_1.background:
I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.
my favorite thing to do is research race cars in my free time.
i ve recently started working as a freelance designer.
I enjoy spending time organizing my space and making sure everything is in its place.
I'm afraid of disappointing my family.

participant_2.background:
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.

content.text: Hi there, I'm glad to meet you! What kind of work do you do?
Hi there! It's nice to meet you too. I'm a musician and I play in a band.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to play in a band. What's your favorite thing about being a musician?
My favorite thing about being a musician is being able to express myself creatively and connect with people through music.
That's awesome! I can see how that would be a great way to connect with people.
So, what kind of music do you play?
I play a variety of genres, but my favorite is rock.
Rock is great! I love listening to rock music.
Me too! It's so much fun to play.
I bet it is! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should totally do it! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I've been meaning to get started for a while.
That's great! Let me know if you need any help getting started.
